resource.name: triton_firewall_rule
resource.description: The `triton_firewall_rule` resource represents a rule for the Triton cloud firewall.

arguments.argument: The firewall rule described using the Cloud API rule syntax defined at https://docs.joyent.com/public-cloud/network/firewall/cloud-firewall-rules-reference.
Whether the rule should be effective.

attributes.attribute: The identifier representing the firewall rule in Triton.

example.description: Allow traffic on ports tcp/80 and tcp/443 to machines with the 'www' tag from any source
Block traffic on port tcp/143 to all machines
